availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, grocer. Green County, Kentucky, native. Son of William Sidebottom and Jane True Sidebottom. Married to Mary S. Moore Sidebottom in Sumner County, Tennessee, on November 15, 1856. Father of Lewis E. Sidebottom, Elizabeth Sidebottom, and Sally E. Sidebottom. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Grocer in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 79B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Greensburg, p. 628.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Greensburg, p. 434B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994036, Green County Births.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Sumner County, 1854 Jun-1895 Jan: Marriages.
Lon Bostick, Family History Book of Christian County, Kentucky (Paducah, KY: Turner Publishing Company, 1991), 225.
